'''''To Tell or Not to Tell, That Is the Question''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Secret Identity#(Temporary) Secret-Keeper|(Temporary) Secret-Keeper]]''.

==Trivia==
* The achievement name likely references a soliloquy in ''{{w|Hamlet}}'' that begins with the line "To be or not to be, that is the question".
